name: cloudsync-al
description: Build, bump version, and deploy AL apps to Business Central Online as PTE with clean terminal output.

pte.environment.description: Fallback environment name if not present in launch configuration.

pte.shell.description: Shell to run PowerShell (pwsh on macOS/Linux/Windows PowerShell 7).

scripts.release:patch: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: prepare release' || echo 'no changes to commit' && npm version patch -m 'chore: release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: prepare release' || echo 'no changes to commit' && npm version minor -m 'chore: release %s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: prepare release' || echo 'no changes to commit' && npm version major -m 'chore: release %s' && git push && git push --tags
